con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Connection" value="keep-alive"/> <con:entry key="User-Agent" value="PostmanRuntime/7.44.1"/> <con:entry key="Accept-Encoding" value="gzip, deflate, br"/> <con:entry key="Accept" value="*/*"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>

con:request.name: Request 1

con:configuration.scriptText: def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def json = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper().parseText(response) context.testCase.setPropertyValue("car1_id", json.id.toString()) log.info("Saved car1_id: " + json.id)
